::KitKat::

 She tossed the rifle at Drillbit and looked at Land Mine. "Your part 
of my team. That makes you worth fighting for." as she smiled warmly 
at Land Mine,"My friend." 

She transformed into wolf mode and walked up, growling, to 
Rizopas. "Here's the deal. Fight me and I'll let you die.  I won't 
tolerate you coming here and attacking my base, threatening my team 
and giving demands.  You fight me or take your cowardly, lowlife, 
cyberworm self out of here and don't bother us again.  So you have a 
choice of infantile one. You can run away and live, or fight me and 
die." she said with a slight smirk. "so put up or shut up!"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Deemos hides behind the rest of them.
> 
> "Here's the deal, fight me and I'll let you live!" Rizopas yelled.
> 
> Stronghold and Blender stood, protecting Deemos.
> 
> Serge put his hand on his stomach and belched. he Transformed to 
robot mode and continued the attack, firing 2 missiles at the 
Predacon cave.
> 
> Doom Ice fired 4 times at the cave.
> 
> Diskus flew up to the cave, firing 2 missiles at it...
